|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A64; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FV; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646Q-HYK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ9031RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, MIPI DSI, LCD, Audio in (3.5mm), Audio out (3.5mm), LiPo battery connector, Micro SD Card slot, |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP803;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;2;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;Advanced Monolithic Systems;AMS1117;;1;,,, 1.2MHz 2A Step Up Converter;Aerosemi;MT3608;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Android, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2017 |estprice = 45 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Bulgaria
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"A64-OLinuXino-Lime2 Rev.D."'' is silkscreened on the board :(to right of the USB A connector). {{see also|Allwinner|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A64 (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53) @1.2 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400'' MP2 *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM @ 672MHz • Samsung *Onboard Storage: 16MB NOR, TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OLinuXino#A64 ''OLinuXino A64'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Olimex_A64-OLinuXino ''Olimex A64-OLinuXino'' on '''Linux-SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/06/06/a64-olinuxino-open-source-hardware-allwinner-a64-development-board-launched-for-50-euros/ ''A64-OLinuXino Open Source Hardware'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-allwinner-a64-hacker-board-runs-linux-or-android/ ''Open spec Allwinner A64 hacker board runs Linux or Android'' on '''LinuxGizmos''' ]
